name: designare
description: Michael Kanda - Web Purist & SEO Expert

scripts.build: node js/generate-articles-db.js && node js/generate-knowledge.js && node generate-sitemap.js && node js/inject-ratings.js && mkdir -p public && cp -r *.html *.css *.svg *.csv *.json js css images Font CSV-Importer-PRO downloads public/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Assets copy done' && node js/inject-footer.js && node js/inject-breadcrumb.js && node js/inject-related.js && node js/inject-blog-articles.js && node js/inject-lazy-loading.js
